The Saturday School

Sharpen your pencils, pack your notebooks and lace your shoes - it's back to school for adults. We create spaces to reconnect with our youth; the learning, the friendships and the fun. The added bonus is that, now we're grown-ups, we can also add alcohol.

Come on, school's in!

Contact us

If you want to find out more about The Saturday School or would like to discuss bespoke events for your organisation then please get in touch ivvet@thesaturdayschool.org
